EmailTemplate.name: Pilot Webinars.Pilot Webinar - Pilot Gateway Demonstration
EmailTemplate.subject: Pilot Gateway Demonstration Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Email Title Honeywell Aerospace Pilot Gateway Demonstration You're invited to participate in this Honeywell Aerospace Pilot Training webinar, hosted by Chris Van Cise with Honeywell Flight Technical Services. The webinar agenda topics will include:
- Learn about Honeywell’s new website and app for pilots - Demonstration will cover creating an account, logging in, and accessing free technical publications, videos, presentations, and other resources for pilots - Attendees will also be shown how the Pilot Gateway also provides easy access to Honeywell experts and technical support - Brief demonstration; estimated at 10 minutes in length - Pilot Gateway Address: http://pilots.Honeywell.com <http://Pilots.Honeywell.Com> - More Information: FTS@Honeywell.com <mailto:FTS@Honeywell.com>
Date: Thursday, October 2nd, 2014 Time: 09:00 - 09:30 AM PST (GMT-7) Duration: 30 minutes
Click here <http://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/Honeywell Pilot Gateway Demonstration.ics> to download an Outlook invite with the link and phone number for the webinar.
**New for this webinar: international toll-free number included in Outlook invite.** Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2014 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
